about_the_game:
Elliot is in his last day of his last year of school and needs to finds a job. He finds a job at a pizzeria called Soggy Pizza. Then he decides to steal a Pizza, he eats and end up with a stomach ache. He enter in the Restroom and a voice says "Entering in the rift zone, opening in 5 days", the door lock it and monsters that are a combination of bathroom utensils and animals apear. How will he survive? With eleven chapters and one extra chapter telling the story of Freitas Studios, discover the fate of Elliot and how he will survive.

Features:
11 chapters of story
1 Extra chapter telling Freitas Studios story
34 pages
English and Portuguese translation.

content_descriptors.notes: Mild swearing and descriptions of death. The main character go to Hell. The characters talk about Heaven and Hell and being reincarnated. A character uses Ritalin (ADHD medication).

Elliot is in his last day of his last year of school and needs to finds a job. He finds a job at a pizzeria called Soggy Pizza. Then he decides to steal a Pizza, he eats and end up with a stomach ache. He enter in the Restroom and a voice says "Entering in the rift zone, opening in 5 days", the door lock it and monsters that are a combination of bathroom utensils and animals apear. How will he survive? With eleven chapters and one extra chapter telling the story of Freitas Studios, discover the fate of Elliot and how he will survive.

short_description: A digital book telling the story of Five Nights at Restroom and Five Nights at Restroom 2. Discover Five Nights at Restroom story with eleven chapters of story and the development of the game and the creation of Freitas Studios with one extra chapter.
